column1: 1. This template is designed to forecast travel queries for a market using the multi-factor approach
2. Fill in the data in each of the input sheets (Historical Queries
3. Adjust the parameters in the Parameters sheet if needed
4. The forecast will automatically calculate based on the input data and parameters

column5: Base growth rate applied to all months (default: 5%, 10%, 15%)
Coefficient for flight search factor calculation (default: 0.05, 0.10, 0.15)
Coefficient for brand health multiplier calculation (default: 0.15, 0.20, 0.25)
